price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Niwibuke n’igihe Musa yabwira umukozi wiwe Yuusha’u mwene Nuuni ati: “Sindota ndeka kubandanya urugendo gushika ngere kw’ihuriro ry’amabahari abiri, canke ngume ngenda ikiringo kirekire gushika aho nzohurira n’umuja mweranda, aheze anyigishe ubumenyi ntafise”.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِفَتَىٰهُ لَآ أَبۡرَحُ حَتَّىٰٓ أَبۡلُغَ مَجۡمَعَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ أَوۡ أَمۡضِيَ حُقُبٗا

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qāla mūsā lifatāhu lā abraḥu ḥattā ablugha majmaʿa al-baḥrayni aw amḍiya ḥuquban
